title: When Dreamers Wake
description: The Old Gods have risen and moved on, leaving Earth in ruins.Leon liked that just fine.He got along better after the collapse of society, and has his own vision for how things should be run: with him in charge of his own fate, with many lovers beneath him.Yet when he has a run-in with a beautiful and mysterious woman, his life will never be the same.
author: J.E. Keep
